sentences.en: Amongst the men, Xiangzi and Er Qiangzi were the odd ones out.
sentences.cn: 在男人里, 祥子与二强子是例外.

sentences.en: An e-mail is already circulating amongst news staff calling for voluntary redundancies.
sentences.cn: 在新闻部员工中已经在转发一封电子邮件,呼吁大家自愿裁汰.

sentences.en: He decided no assassin would chance a shot from amongst that crowd.
sentences.cn: 他认定，没有刺客会冒险混在人群里开枪。

sentences.en: He dodged amongst the seething crowds of men.
sentences.cn: 他在川流不息的人群中东躲西闪。

sentences.en: He was sitting amongst a group of children, telling them a story.
sentences.cn: 他正坐在一群孩子中间讲故事.

sentences.en: He's never grown away from the people amongst whom he was brought up.
sentences.cn: 他与那些伴随自己长大的人一直保持亲密的关系。

sentences.en: Here in Trinity it is right that I should give you an account of how he lived amongst you during these years of his greatest achievement.
sentences.cn: 正是在三一学院这儿，我将对你们阐述他如何在你们中间生活，如何在这些年中取得他的最伟大的成就。

sentences.en: Michael pointed out to me that amongst the rubble, there was one building that remained untouched.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔指给我看说，瓦砾中有一栋建筑完好无损。

sentences.en: Mozart's compositions are undoubtedly amongst the world's greatest.
sentences.cn: 莫扎特的作品无疑位居世界上最伟大的作品之列。

sentences.en: She is the tallest amongst her classmates.
sentences.cn: 她在她同学之中是最高的.

sentences.en: The church here was left a bequest to hire doctors who would work amongst the poor.
sentences.cn: 这个教堂接收到一笔遗产，可以用来聘请医生为穷人治病。

sentences.en: The conference discussed, amongst other things , the problem of environmental protection.
sentences.cn: 除了其他问题以外, 会上还讨论了环保问题.

sentences.en: There is a clear demand amongst victims for some sort of reparation from offenders.
sentences.cn: 受害者明确要求责任人给予一定的赔偿。

sentences.en: There was a strong feeling of fellowship amongst the members of the team.
sentences.cn: 那个队各个队员之间有一种强烈的队友情谊.

sentences.en: They earned a fortune amongst themselves.
Unemployment amongst married women reached a peak.
sentences.cn: 在已婚女性中失业率达到了顶峰.

sentences.en: You must settle the matter amongst yourselves.
sentences.cn: 你们必须彼此商量,自行解决这些问题.

trans.tran_en: in or through the middle of a group of people or things
